title: Warm bean and tomato salad
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '3 tablespoons white wine', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 (400g) tin cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '60g rocket', '25g shaved Parmesan cheese (optional)']
